short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accessibility extension for Chrome; highlights, speaks and enlarges text based on custom user preferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is meant to help the visually-impaired navigate the Internet independently through a combination of text highlighting (it can automaticallly adjust as you browse), text size toggling and text-to-speech.

*Features

Toggle Text Highlight changes the colors of the text and backgrounds on your web browser to reflect your custom settings.

Toggle Text-to-Speech enables or disables the text-to-speech function.

Both of these feature buttons will emit an auditory announcement when clicked as well as react by changing colors. 

If you click on preferences, you can customize a variety of things in your browser, from colors to sizes of fonts and elements, and more.

 Find a full guide, most recent changelogs and more at alight.bertramtechnologies.com!

*Report an Issue

Please submit bug reports to: bugs@bertramtechnologies.com with the subject line "ALIGHT BUG"; in the body of the e-mail, please describe what issue you are currently experiencing so that we can replicate it and fix it.

Screenshots and video are helpful, and if possible, can make fixing issues much easier.
